item.description:
Wassail!

Alice, David, and Kaity came out for the December meeting at Borders and shared some hearty discussion. Thanks to all for attending! That fulfills my "contractual obligations" to CWPN. Alice, David, and Kaity are invited to attend the Yule gathering at my Hartford home on the evening of Thursday, Dec 21.

6:00pm - gather, socialize, eat, drink, etc.
7:00pm - pre-ritual discussion
7:30pm - blot (formal ritual)
8:30pm - husel (feasting)

There may or not be a sumbel later in the evening, depending on the number of people, the lateness of the hour, etc.

Please note that I am extending this invitation to those people on this list that I have already met, OR, to those who make arrangements to meet me for a quick cup of coffee before the 21st. I regret if that offends anyone, but I'm not comfortable opening my home to just anybody sight unseen. We need some face time in a public setting first. :)

If you have any questions, just ask. :)
Mike

group.name: Connecticut & Western Mass Asatru Meetup Group

item.name: The Hartford Asatru Yule Meetup
